desc: Minky Designs minky blankets are the softest minky blankets in the world. Shop Plush Minky Blankets, Mid-Plush Minky Blankets or Cuddly Minky Blankets. When longer minky threads and superior quality combine, the most fluffy, cozy feel ever, is the result. You must experience it to understand the difference.

layout.text: Get 40% off all minky blankets! Just use code Summer40 at checkout.
